LanguageData.Component.label: component
LanguageData.Component.description: A collection of simple spare parts that have a variety of uses in construction and production.
LanguageData.MetalCan.label: metal can
LanguageData.MetalCan.description: Empty metal cans are needed for canned meals.
LanguageData.Wire.label: wire
LanguageData.Wire.description: Wire is produced from high conductivity metals. It is useful for carrying electric currents in electrical devices.

LanguageData.ReinforcedConcrete.label: reinforced concrete
LanguageData.ReinforcedConcrete.description: Reinforced concrete is made from concrete and metal in order to strengthen the mixture.
LanguageData.Mechanism.label: mechanism
LanguageData.Mechanism.description: Simple mechanisms are used in simple machines. They are gear-like parts.
LanguageData.AdvMechanism.label: advanced mechanism
LanguageData.AdvMechanism.description: Advanced mechanism are used in complex machines. They are intricate gear-like parts.
